metadata.title: USN-3443-3 -- Linux kernel (GCP) vulnerability
metadata.description: Andrey Konovalov discovered that a divide-by-zero error existed in the TCP stack implementation in the Linux kernel. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash). (CVE-2017-14106)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3443-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-image-extra-4.10.0-1007-gcp - 4.10.0-1007.7 linux-image-4.10.0-1007-gcp - 4.10.0-1007.7 No subscription required
